typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		Asset_ID as string,
		Fund_ID as string,
		Incident_Id as string,
		Reporting_Period as string,
		Incident_Type_Code as string,
		Incident_Severity as string,
		Incident_Description as string,
		Investigation_Undertaken as string,
		Incident_Findings as string,
		Incident_Date as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false) ~> LoadFromScrubbedToStagingDB
source(output(
		Asset_ID as string,
		Fund_ID as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	query: 'SELECT DISTINCT [Asset_ID],[Fund_ID]\nFROM [relational].[Asset]\nWHERE record_deleted_flag = 0',
	format: 'query') ~> RelationalAsset
ValidatedIncidentIDandDate@ValidDateAndIncidentID, SelectRelationalAsset lookup(ValidatedIncidentIDandDate@ValidDateAndIncidentID@Asset_ID == Relation_Asset_ID
	&& ValidatedIncidentIDandDate@ValidDateAndIncidentID@Fund_ID == Relation_Fund_ID,
	broadcast: 'none')~> LookupRelationAsset
ValidatedAsset@ValidFundAndAsset select(mapColumn(
		Asset_ID,
		Fund_ID,
		Incident_Id,
		Reporting_Period,
		Incident_Type_Code,
		Incident_Severity,
		Incident_Description,
		Investigation_Undertaken,
		Incident_Findings,
		Incident_Date
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectValidRecord
ConvertDateAndIncidentID split(not(isNull(Derived_Incident_Id)) && not(isNull(Derived_Reporting_Period)) && not(isNull(Incident_Date)),
	disjoint: false) ~> ValidatedIncidentIDandDate@(ValidDateAndIncidentID, InvalidDateOrIncidentID)
LoadFromScrubbedToStagingDB derive(Derived_Reporting_Period = toDate(Reporting_Period,"dd/MM/yyyy"),
		Derived_Incident_Date = toDate(Incident_Date,"dd/MM/yyyy"),
		Derived_Incident_Id = toInteger(Incident_Id)) ~> ConvertDateAndIncidentID
InvalidDateOrIncidentIDerrormessage select(mapColumn(
		Asset_ID,
		Fund_ID,
		Incident_Id,
		Reporting_Period,
		Incident_Type_Code,
		Incident_Severity,
		Incident_Description,
		Investigation_Undertaken,
		Incident_Findings,
		Incident_Date,
		Validation_Error
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectInvalidDateOrIncidentID
ValidatedIncidentIDandDate@InvalidDateOrIncidentID derive(Validation_Error = toString("Invalid Reporting Period / Incident Date / Incident ID")) ~> InvalidDateOrIncidentIDerrormessage
RelationalAsset select(mapColumn(
		Relation_Asset_ID = Asset_ID,
		Relation_Fund_ID = Fund_ID
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectRelationalAsset
LookupRelationAsset split(not(isNull(Relation_Asset_ID)),
	disjoint: false) ~> ValidatedAsset@(ValidFundAndAsset, InvalidFundOrAsset)
ValidatedAsset@InvalidFundOrAsset derive(Validation_Error = toString("Invalid Fund Or Asset")) ~> InvalidFundOrAsseterrormessage
InvalidFundOrAsseterrormessage select(mapColumn(
		Asset_ID,
		Fund_ID,
		Incident_Id,
		Reporting_Period,
		Incident_Type_Code,
		Incident_Severity,
		Incident_Description,
		Investigation_Undertaken,
		Incident_Findings,
		Incident_Date,
		Validation_Error
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectInvalidFundOrAsset
SelectValidRecord, SelectInvalidDateOrIncidentID, SelectInvalidFundOrAsset union(byName: true)~> UnionAll
UnionAll sink(input(
		Asset_ID as string,
		Fund_ID as string,
		Incident_Id as string,
		Reporting_Period as string,
		Incident_Type_Code as string,
		Incident_Severity as string,
		Incident_Description as string,
		Investigation_Undertaken as string,
		Incident_Findings as string,
		Incident_Date as string,
		Validation_Error as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	truncate:true,
	format: 'table',
	mapColumn(
		Asset_ID,
		Fund_ID,
		Incident_Id,
		Reporting_Period,
		Incident_Type_Code,
		Incident_Severity,
		Incident_Description,
		Investigation_Undertaken,
		Incident_Findings,
		Incident_Date,
		Validation_Error
	)) ~> StagingDB
